text: Swashbuckler is a 1976 American romantic adventure movie directed by James Goldstone and stars Robert Shaw, James Earl Jones, Peter Boyle, Genevi√®ve Bujold, Beau Bridges and Anjelica Huston. It was distributed by Universal Pictures and was a box office bomb. ==Other websites== * on The Internet Movie Database.
